pkgmetadata.longdescription: MarkLogic NoSQL Database Server in-Database Analytics for R // Functionality required to efficiently use R with MarkLogic NoSQL Database Server, http://www.marklogic.com/what-is- marklogic/. Many basic and complex R operations are pushed down into the database, which removes the main memory boundary of R and allows to make full use of MarkLogic server. In order to use the package you need a MarkLogic Server version 8 or higher.
